name: DiviNationKit for Divi
author: DiviNationKit

sections.description:
ðŸ”¥Introducing “DiviNationKit,” a powerful Divi extension to elevate your Divi theme experience by offering a plethora of functional and creative Divi modules. Perfect for designers, developers, and website owners, DiviNationKit empowers you to build stunning, highly customizable websites with ease.

Live Preview

With DiviNationKit, the possibilities are endless. You can effortlessly create visually striking pages that captivate your audience and improve user engagement. The user-friendly interface allows for quick module deployment and real-time editing, ensuring your website design process is smooth and efficient. Plus, our regular updates ensure compatibility with the latest Divi and WordPress versions, along with the introduction of new features to keep your website ahead of the curve.

Transform your website-building experience with DiviNationKit and unlock the full potential of the Divi theme. Make your vision a reality with our innovative modules and take your website design to new heights.

DiviNationKit Lite contains 10 free custom modules and more to come soon.

  • Advanced Divider – To separate two section. You will find 2 types of dividers. 1. Divider with icon 2. Divider with text. And you will have full control to customize those dividers.
  • Blog Posts – module enriches your Divi website by displaying your blog content in a customizable format. With options for post layout, category filters, and pagination.
  • Business Hour – module enhances your Divi website by clearly displaying your operating hours. This helps inform visitors of your availability, improving user experience and ensuring they can plan their interactions with your business accordingly.
  • Dual Button – Allowing users to add two distinct call-to-action buttons side-by-side. This feature increases engagement by offering multiple choices, encouraging visitors to take action and explore different options.
  • Flip Card with 4 types of flip card effects to choose from (Flip Left, Flip Right, Flip Up, and Flip Down), you can create stunning interactive content that converts.
  • Gradient Heading – module adds a vibrant and modern touch to a Divi website by enabling the creation of headings with gradient colors. This feature draws attention to important text, making your content stand out and creating a more dynamic and visually appealing design.
  • Icon Box – Can help you to define features with each item highlighted by its icon.
  • Icon List – Create an easy-to-manage list of items, with each item highlighted by its icon.
  • Logo Slider – Module enhances a Divi website by showcasing a rotating carousel of client logos or partner brands. This visually appealing feature helps build credibility and trust, highlighting collaborations and endorsements to potential customers.
  • Masonry Gallery – module enhances your Divi website by displaying images in a dynamic, grid-like layout with varying sizes. This visually captivating design optimizes space and creates a seamless flow, making your photo galleries more engaging and aesthetically pleasing.
  • Person – Module allowing users to create detailed profiles for team members, including photos, bios, and social media links. This personal touch helps build trust and connection with visitors by showcasing the people behind the business.
  • Price List – To enhance a Divi website by allowing users to display their products or services with clear, organized pricing. This helps to improve user experience and transparency, making it easier for visitors to understand and compare offerings.
  • Rating – allowing users to display star ratings for products or services. This visual representation of customer satisfaction helps visitors quickly assess quality, boosting trust and increasing the likelihood of conversions.
  • Review – Enable you to display customer reviews and testimonials in an attractive and organized manner. This builds trust and credibility, encouraging potential customers to make purchasing decisions based on positive feedback.
  • Skill Progress Bar – module brings an interactive element to a Divi website by showcasing your skills or competencies through visually engaging progress bars. This feature effectively communicates expertise levels, making it easier for visitors to grasp your strengths at a glance.
  • Testimonial Slider – module introduces a dynamic way to display customer testimonials on a Divi website. This feature allows you to rotate through multiple reviews in a sleek, space-saving slider, providing social proof and building trust with potential clients in an engaging format.

Many more Divi Modules and Extensions are coming soon…

If you have any questions or feature ideas please create a new thread in Support.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

We recommend your host supports:

  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater
  • WP Memory limit of 64 MB or greater (128 MB or higher is preferred)

Installation

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Pages > Add New
  4. Click on “Use The Divi Builder” and Click on “Use Visual Builder”.
  5. Now type in DiviNationKit on the search box and it will Divi Supreme Module will appear.
sections.faq:
Do I need Divi Theme for DiviNationKit to work?

Yes, you must have Divi Theme, Extra Theme, or Divi Builder for this plugin to work. Divi by ElegantThemes

Does it work with the Divi Visual Builder?

YES! At least Divi 3.1 onwards where they introduced the Divi Developer API.

Divi Theme >= version 3.1
Extra Theme >= version 2.1
Divi Builder >= version 2.1
PHP version >= 7.0

Is this plugin free?

Yes! DiviNationKit is absolutely free. There is no hidden charge.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.5 – 31 August 2024

  • Updated: Performance issues
  • Fixed: Testimonial Slider image size issue
  • Fixed: Progress Bar icon issue
  • Fixed: Other module issues
  • Added: Blog Post module
  • Added: Masonry Gallery

Version 1.0.4 – 15 August 2024

  • compatibility: Divi 4.27.1
  • Feature: Added icon position (left/right/center) on Divider
  • Feature: Business Hour items settings
  • Fixed: Business Hour global divider issue
  • Fixed: Icon box border issue
  • Fixed: Modules margin padding
  • Fixed: Divider font weight

Version 1.0.3 – 10 August 2024

Added New Modules, features and fixed issues

  • compatibility: WordPress 6.6.1
  • compatibility: Divi 4.27.0
  • Added: Skill Progress Bar
  • Added: Business Hour
  • Added: Gradient Heading
  • Added: Testimonial Slider
  • Fixed: Update Dual Button module to customize in an organized way
  • Fixed: Price list image alignment issue. Items margin, padding, border
  • Fixed: Logo slider RTL mode not working in live
  • Fixed: flip card box-shadow
  • Fixed: Person module layout issue
  • Feature: A text area was added for the rating module.
  • Feature: Tooltip on icon list module and fixed border issue.
  • Feature: Added badge on icon box module

Version 1.0.2 – 12 July 2024

  • Fixed previous modules *
  • Security Updates *
  • Module added: Dual Button *
  • Module added: Person *
  • Module added: Rating *
  • Module added: Review *

Version 1.0.1 – 11 July 2024

  • Official Public release

short_description: Powerful Divi modules to make your website more creative and professional
